result.title: My Online Judge (Social Network for Programming)
result.content:
Hello,

I am currently working on a research project for my university and I've been inspired to create a social network for programming. My Online Judge (MOJ) is a page where you can connect accounts of different judges such as COJ, UVA, CodeForces, etc to share your stats with other users. You can also share your programs, news and projects. Today I started my first test phase on the page and I would like you to be part of it. I hope to receive your feedback, so I can bring this project forward.

Thank you very much!

You can register at: http://moj.projectace.net/
